articles.content: Actor Akshay Kumar will soon be seen in Aanand L Rai’s directorial Raksha Bandhan. The film will be his third big-budget release this year. Besides a few exceptions, the box office hasn’t scored much… [+2349 chars]

articles.author: Ben Zimmer
articles.title: Beyoncé and Lizzo cut “ableist slur” from new albums: How the word became taboo. - Slate
articles.description: How did the controversial term go from middle-school slang to verboten? The answer lies on the other side of the Atlantic.
articles.content: Twice in the past couple of months, a musical superstar changed the lyrics to a new song to avoid a problematic slang term: spaz. First came Lizzo, whose song Grrrls, released as a single in June, or… [+10298 chars]

articles.title: Jason Momoa Takes on FLIGHT ATTENDANT Duties Mid-Flight! - Entertainment Tonight
articles.description: Jason Momoa is flying high! The 'Aquaman' star took on flight attendant duties and passed out waters to passenger's mid-flight.
